title: Identify the a and $$b$$.
text: Identify the a, $$b$$, and $$n$$ of $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$. Here, $$a=m$$, $$b=n$$, $$n=5$$.

title: Use the binomial theorm.
text: Follow the binomial theorem from this image.\n##figure1.gif##

title: substitute into the binomial theorem.
text: Substitute the a, $$b$$, and $$n$$ that you found into the binomial equation.

title: Simplify.
text: Simplify, resulting in $$m^5+5m^4 n^1+10m^3 n^2+10m^2 n^3+5m^1 n^4+n^5$$.
